BUSTATION Email Email BUSTATION
Login Sign up Plan exactly the time of your next trip! Save time knowing the route of the public buses in Costa Rica. This app will allow you to know in real time the location of the bus that you need to know. Join us!
Login Sign up Dont have an account? LOGÍN Email Password
Create account Cancel Home Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Android Studio android.studio@android.com Navigation header Settings
Home Gallery Slideshow Contac History Terms of use Team About us Sign off Admin
The BU-STATION App was born thanks to the idea of 3 students from the Fidélitas University in Costa Rica, where in a project to be carried out in one of their courses, they propose to design the idea of showing the bus route in real time, with in order to help users save waiting times and thus help them make better use of their time.\n\nAs a result of this idea, this group of people worked on the design of the application for more than three months , where sharing their ideas and advised by a teacher, they manage to complete this objective that brought a sigh to all those people. Historia

Neighbor of Guadalupe, San José. He is in his second year of degree in systems engineering. He really likes everything that he has to do with technology, because he understands that it is a means that helps human beings to have a better quality of life and also to be a better person. Edit... Team

View Current Route Check bus stop WELCOME Check the bus route you want Periferica Escazú Alajuela Fidélitas
Periférica 1 Schedule: 5am - 9pm Price: ₡500 Operation days: Every day Description: The PERIFÉRICA L1 bus (Terminal Hatillo 2, Municipal Recycling Center > Terminal Hatillo 2, Municipal Recycling Center) is a circular line with 72 stops, starting at Hatillo 2, Municipal Recycling Center.
Escazú Schedule: 5am - 9pm Price: ₡1500 Operation days: Monday to Friday Description: The SAN JOSÉ - ESCAZÚ CENTER bus (Escazú Terminal, north side Parque Escazú → Terminal San José, Ministry of Health Park) has 16 stops from terminal Escazú, north side Parque Escazú to San José Terminal, Ministry of Health Park
Tuasa Alajuela Schedule: 5am - 9pm Price: ₡800 Operation days: Every day Description: The SAN JOSÉ - ALAJUELA COLECTIVO bus (Tuasa Terminal Alajuela → Tuasa terminal San José Station Wagon) has 32 stops from terminal Tuasa Alajuela to Tuasa Terminal San José Station Wagon.
Fidélitas Bus Schedule: 5am - 9pm Price: ₡300 Operation days: Monday to Saturday Description: The SAN JOSÉ - SAN PEDRO - GRANADILLA (Fidelitas University) bus (Terminal San José → Terminal Urb. Mansiones, proximities Club Campestre La Campiña) has 33 stops from San José Terminal to Terminal Urb. Mansiones, proximities Club Campestre La Campiña.
